medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a 2-year history of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation and was treated with oral amiodarone over the last 6 months. In the last 4 weeks, he experienced nervousness, palpitations, and weight loss of 3 kg. There were no changes in appetite, insomnia, or major changes in bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had no history of previous thyroid diseases but had a 2-year history of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation treated by electroconversion.
